r.d: With Parle, it is possible to implement lexing and parsing in PHP while relying on features and principles of the parser/lexer generator tools for C/C++.
r.n: - Implement Parser::readBison() (Ben Hanson) - Parser::dump() and Lexer::dump() are supported in UTF-32 mode (Ben Hanson) - Parser::dump() and Lexer::dump() use PHP streams (Ben Hanson) - Update the bundled parsertl/lexertl libraries (Ben Hanson) - Fix Windows build (Ben Hanson)
